title: Provocations
description: An AI-powered analysis tool designed to deepen your thinking rather than replace it. Paste meeting transcripts, reports, or notes and receive thoughtful provocations that challenge assumptions and reveal new perspectives.

title: Bilko Flow
tagline: Typed DSL, determinism model, and planner protocol for deterministic workflow creation
description: A TypeScript library that defines the typed DSL, determinism model, planner protocol, and RBAC system for deterministic workflow creation â€” designed for consumption by AI agents and workflow orchestrators.

title: Bilko's AI School
description: A conversational AI-powered learning platform featuring Bilko as an AI host. Includes workflow automation, flow inspection with DAG visualization, AI video generation, and a rules-first governance architecture.

title: NPR Podcast Player
tagline: Ad-free listening experience for NPR podcasts
description: Ad-free listening experience for NPR podcasts, powered by bilko-flow workflow orchestration. Features automatic ad detection and skipping using transcript-duration analysis and NPR-specific heuristics.

title: Research To App Trials
tagline: Transform research concepts into functional application prototypes
description: A complex flow application built with bilko-flow that transforms research concepts into functional application prototypes using only open-source models. Demonstrates a sophisticated flow-of-flows architecture with multi-step workflow orchestration.

title: Your News Agency
description: A personalized news aggregation and curation platform built with React and Express. Leverages AI to curate and present news content tailored to user interests.

title: Level Up Agency
description: An AI agent platform designed to level up productivity and workflows. Built with a modern React and Express stack featuring comprehensive UI components.

title: Parent Academy
description: An educational platform for parents featuring AI-guided learning modules, parenting resources, and community features. Built with modern web technologies and a structured curriculum approach.

title: Watch Health
description: A health monitoring application that tracks and visualizes wellness data. Features comprehensive dashboards for health metrics with an intuitive UI built on React and Express.

title: Family Frame
tagline: Smart home device for touch screen with home-to-home features
description: Transform your smart screen into a dedicated social network for households. Connect with family, share memories through Google Photos integration, and stay in sync across distances with shared calendars and live weather from all family locations.

title: Sensei v8
tagline: Neural Network AI server for board game strategy
description: A standalone Python neural network server for board game AI. Features ONNX Runtime inference with HMAC-authenticated evaluation endpoints, supporting both quantized (int8) and full precision models.

title: D360 Solution Manager Extended
description: An extended enterprise solution management platform for D360. Built with JavaScript for enterprise data management and solution configuration workflows.

title: Graph Explorer
description: An interactive web application for visualizing and analyzing data relationships using graph theory concepts. Features circular graph layouts, match rules engine, and real-time node/edge interaction for data deduplication and quality analysis.

title: Congenial Dollop
description: A 2D top-down shooter game built with Phaser.js and TypeScript. Features player movement, automatic enemy targeting, health and score systems, with Capacitor support for iOS deployment.
